statements: SELECT * FROM Billing;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM Billing WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Billing WHERE billing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT billing_id, invoice_number, total_amount FROM Billing ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Billing WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY billing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Billing WHERE billing_id = 100;
SELECT billing_id, patient_id, total_amount FROM Billing WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM Billing WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE age > 30) ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT billing_id, invoice_number, total_amount FROM Billing WHERE billing_date < '2022-06-01' OR total_amount < 500 ORDER BY billing_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients, SUM(total_amount) AS total_billing FROM Billing GROUP BY billing_date HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_billing DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM Claims;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'Blue Cross';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM Patients JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, insurance_provider FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='Fever';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan, record_date FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 40 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_name, total_amount FROM patients JOIN billing_info ON patients.patient_id = billing_info.patient_id WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_phone_number FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3 AND appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount, claim_status FROM patients JOIN insurance_claims ON patients.patient_id = insurance_claims.patient_id WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM procedures ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_cost FROM procedures WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT bill_date, total_cost FROM billing WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'HealthCare';
SELECT diagnoses.diagnosis_name, patients.first_name, patients.last_name FROM diagnoses JOIN patients ON diagnoses.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(procedure_cost) AS total_procedure_cost FROM procedures GROUP BY patient_id;

SELECT billing.bill_id, billing.bill_date, billing.total_cost, insurance_claims.claimed_amount FROM billing JOIN insurance_claims ON billing.bill_id = insurance_claims.bill_id ORDER BY billing.bill_date DESC, insurance_claims.claimed_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
